name: Are You Sure?
description:
Are You Sure? is a piece of interactive fiction created for the NarraScope 2020 Game Jam. The theme of the jam was "Growth", and Are You Sure? is a story about a relationship, an uninvited guest and a very confusing morning, based very loosely on real events. The game was created with Texture.


(Cover photo:  Fred Dawson, CC BY-NC-ND 2.0)
